introduction.title: The Time-Torn City
introduction.narrative: You are a time traveler who has become stranded in a city that is constantly shifting between the past, present, and future. You must find a way to stabilize time and escape the city.

fix_the_timeline.title: A Futile Effort
fix_the_timeline.narrative: You try to mend the fractured timeline, but your efforts are in vain. The city is too far gone, and you are consumed by the temporal chaos.

find_a_way_out.title: A Glimmer of Hope
find_a_way_out.narrative: You find a temporal rift that could lead you home. It is a risky jump, but it is your only hope.

jump_through_the_rift.title: Escape or Oblivion?
jump_through_the_rift.narrative: You leap into the rift, not knowing what awaits you on the other side. You are either on your way home or to your doom.
